import { useEffect,useState } from "react"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; function UserProfile(){ let [user,setUser]=useState(""); const history = useHistory(); useEffect(()=>{ let userobj=JSON.parse( localStorage.getItem("user")); setUser({...userobj}); },[]); function handleOrders(){ history.push("/orders"); } return(
